typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Airport_Name as string,
		Altitude as short,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		DST as string,
		IATA as string,
		ICAO as string,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		Time_Zone as string,
		UTC_offset as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ArptBlob
